channel.title: Infinity Blade
channel.description:
took me a little while (had to fix quads.. lines.. and more quads), mainly because alot of those would f***-up the model in-game... [b]Heres a Render [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xor5m8.png[/img]
[b]Heres in-game [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2i9p75u.png[/img]
[b]Do you think i should release this? kinda stummped if its good enuf...

item.title: Infinity Blade
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

the1337legend:

oo mmk, i couldnt see it too well, and also try blending the blade into the hilt instead of just leaving the blade slapped onto the hilt, like uhhh i guess, try smoothing the blade into a curve into the hilt, i guess, like a d scim?, b.c it needs to flow a bit :):)

Acually those 2 ball’s (dont have a perverted mind…) are part of the disign, so i cant really smooth it into a hilt much.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:13, topic:283602”]b.c the colours are semi related

uhhh looks nice, although [IMO] i hate long handles that extend back out of the players hand and look bulky. other than that it looks decent :)[/quote]
Well it doesnt acually extend out of the players hand, it more or less was just not high anough for the player, i miss-positioned it.

item.title: Infinity Blade
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

[quote=“vexx1345, post:9, topic:283602”]leeched from dragonfable[/quote]Quit the effing grave diggs.
Reminds me about people who don’t have Common Sense (OMFG, is he really going to start about that AGAIN!? - YES I DO)

You don’t have any Common Sense, I can tell that from your post.
Don’t tell me that you do, because:

-A person who has Common Sense would’ve first read the last reply to the post, and then consider if it is a dieing topic which he would leave uncommented.

-Or that it was a topic where he : had difficulties with and wanted to ask the author for help/ wanted to help someone who asked for help but therefor they did not reply to his problem(s).

Otherwise, said:
Go read the rules, if you actually can read.
Go read some books and/or tutorials on this community , then come back here posting.

Sincerely ,

  • Assassins Creed Fan.

Read full topic
